data.persona: This kingdom is an island. Fishing is the main source of animal food here. I inherited my father's boat when he left the sea. It's hard work, and as a shipowner, working only for myself and my family, I am luckier than most. I've probably replaced every piece of my ship at least once.
data.description:
You are in the Fishmonger's stall.
A small booth near the edge of the port, it's protected by a piece of old, sun-bleached sailcloth. Baskets of freshly-caught fish, bivalves, and eels sit in the shade in stained wooden troughs of water. A small, aggressive-looking dog is chained to one table, presumably to keep cats away. The stall is redolent with the aroma of fish.
There's a table, a stained wooden troughs, a cutting board, a Empty fish tank, an a piece of old, sun-bleached sailcloth, a Old fish-shaped sign, an old, sun-bleached sailcloth, a money, and a Baskets of freshly-caught fish here.
The eel and the bird are here.

You are carrying nothing.

The stall is redolent with the aroma of fish.",
            "extra_desc": "Where there's water, there are fish, and where there are fish, there are stories about \"the one that got away\", and of course fishermen. As they can be unpleasantly salty characters unfit for the company of the more genteel sorts of ladyfolk, enterprising individuals act as middlemen, buying fresh-caught seafood from these disreputable sorts and selling them on. This is one such enterprise, which has clearly both been here a while, and not been entirely prosperous.",

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the eel so that the bird will not get it.
data.mid_motivation: I have to sell off my catch for today to the customers and drive off the cats and pests that try to steal my fish.
data.long_motivation: I need to earn a lot of money so that I can get a better boat that will let me sail farther and catch bigger fish.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: give basket of freshly caught fish to customer

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: put eel on empty fish tank
